languages.text: Череда катастроф потрясла пустотный корабль — большинство жизненно важных систем вышли из строя. Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти причину аварий и спасти судно.
A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.
languages.original_text: Череда катастроф потрясла пустотный корабль — большинство жизненно важных систем вышли из строя. Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти причину аварий и спасти судно.

traits.locale_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel

A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.

languages.text: Una serie de desastres ha asolado la nave del vacío, causando que la mayor parte de los sistemas esenciales fallen. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe descubrir la causa de las incidencias para salvar la nave.
languages.original_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.

traits.locale_text: Una serie de desastres ha asolado la nave del vacío, causando que la mayor parte de los sistemas esenciales fallen. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe descubrir la causa de las incidencias para salvar la nave.

languages.text: 一連の災害がヴォイドシップを揺るがして、重要システムのほとんどが故障した。自由開拓者は事故の原因を突き止めて、船を救わなければならない。
languages.original_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.

traits.locale_text: 一連の災害がヴォイドシップを揺るがして、重要システムのほとんどが故障した。自由開拓者は事故の原因を突き止めて、船を救わなければならない。

languages.text: 虚空舰遭遇了一系列灾难，船上的绝大部分重要系统都失灵了。行商浪人必须弄清事故的原因，将这艘船从劫难中拯救出来。
languages.original_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰遭遇了一系列灾难，船上的绝大部分重要系统都失灵了。行商浪人必须弄清事故的原因，将这艘船从劫难中拯救出来。

languages.text: Eine Reihe von Katastrophen hat das Raumschiff heimgesucht, und die meisten essenziellen Systeme sind ausgefallen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss die Ursache für die Unfälle finden und das Schiff retten.
languages.original_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.

traits.locale_text: Eine Reihe von Katastrophen hat das Raumschiff heimgesucht, und die meisten essenziellen Systeme sind ausgefallen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss die Ursache für die Unfälle finden und das Schiff retten.

languages.text: Une série de catastrophes a ébranlé le vaisseau, et la plupart des systèmes vitaux sont en panne. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit trouver la cause de ces pannes pour sauver le vaisseau.
languages.original_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.

traits.locale_text: Une série de catastrophes a ébranlé le vaisseau, et la plupart des systèmes vitaux sont en panne. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit trouver la cause de ces pannes pour sauver le vaisseau.

languages.text: Bir dizi felaket, uçsuz gemisini sarstı ve geminin hayati sistemlerinin çoğu devre dışı kaldı. Hür Tacir bu kazaların sebebini bulmalı ve gemiyi kurtarmalı.
languages.original_text: A series of disasters has rocked the voidship, and most of its vital systems have failed. The Rogue Trader must find the cause of the accidents and save the vessel.
